Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and the Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz, Alley, and a woman, starting with a seemingly dramatic rescue and quickly shifting to a confrontation over an unpaid debt, revealing Alley's opportunistic nature.

sub_scenes.title: The Drowning and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is in distress in the water and is rescued by Alley, prompted by a woman's alert.

sub_scenes.title: The Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately after the rescue, Alley confronts King Guz about an old debt, revealing a possible ulterior motive behind the rescue.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-In and Test Drive
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's journey to trade in his old dinosaur, Bronto Soreness, for a newer model, leading him to Honest Zog's dealership and a test drive of a smaller, bitey dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness's Age and Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Bronto Soreness are traveling, but Bronto's clumsiness and age become apparent.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Suggestion and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is advised to trade in his old dinosaur, leading Alley Oop to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Deal Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is offered a test drive at the dealership, and a deal for Dinny's dinosaur is discussed.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Exciting and Bumpy Test Drive
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop enjoys an exciting test drive that takes an unexpected turn when the dinosaur bites at his hat.

sub_scenes.title: Deal Conclusion and Old Dinosaur's Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Despite the biting incident, Alley Oop proceeds with the purchase, while the old dinosaur is depicted with sadness.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and New Dinosaur Instructions
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and Dinny say goodbye to the old dinosaur and receive instructions for the new one.

sub_scenes.title: Regret and Old Dinosaur's Fate at Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Dinny reflects on the trade-in with regret, and the old dinosaur is marked down for sale at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Scolding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's initial experiences with the new dinosaur, including a minor mishap and a harsh scolding from Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Sales and Initial Ride Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Scenes at the dealership showcase sales tactics and a disgruntled customer, followed by Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur and a minor accident.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop falls off the new dinosaur after bumping into a tree and receives a harsh scolding from Dinny.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Charge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny's emotional outburst and overprotective behavior towards his dinosaur, culminating in a charge towards cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Anger and Dinosaur Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny expresses anger about mistreatment and fiercely defends his dinosaur when another caveman hits it.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Impending Charge
sub_scenes.description: Dinny, in a protective rage, charges towards cave children playing with bones.

Major_Arcs.title: Ooola and Alley's Breakup and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a romantic conflict between Alley Oop and Ooola, leading to a breakup and physical attack, followed by misogynistic reflections from other men.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Ooola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to a confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Men fishing express misogynistic views, complaining about women's unpredictability and demanding nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Competition and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic rivalry, jealousy, and miscommunication, leading to physical violence and eventual clarification of affections.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Doubt
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss competition for Oola's attention, leading to arguments and challenges about her interest.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Violence, and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to a physical confrontation, which is resolved by a revelation of a romantic misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Rhyming
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romance and learn about romantic techniques, including rhyming.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Crocodile Incident
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures are made with flowers and a leafy branch, leading to jealousy and a confrontation with a crocodile.

sub_scenes.title: Vulgar Tree Climbing and Flashback Anger
sub_scenes.description: A humorous observation about tree climbing is followed by a flashback of anger over lost love.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Tension and Jealousy Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: Romantic tensions and jealous misunderstandings escalate, involving accusations of cowardice, cannibalism, and finger-eating.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Frenchmen
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity lead to violence and then a shift to forgiveness and a strange comment about Frenchmen.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic New Leaf and Hand Kissing
sub_scenes.description: A caveman vows to become romantic and attempts a courteous hand-kissing gesture.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Perils
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a dance craze called 'the twitch', highlighting its injuries and the social pressure to participate, culminating in a humorous reveal about its dangers.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Injuries and Peer Pressure
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from 'the twist' are observed, and Alley is pressured to learn 'the twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson Mishaps and Name Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A dance lesson for 'the twitch' is fraught with clumsy mishaps and a humorous name reveal of the instructor.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Lesson Debrief, Prank, and Hospital
sub_scenes.description: Alley's lack of progress in 'the twitch' leads to humiliation and a prank, culminating in a visit to a hospital ward filled with 'twitch' related injuries.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romance Interruption
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc blends historical research with time travel, leading to an accidental romantic encounter and a disrupted kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Research Plan
sub_scenes.description: Researchers discuss the problem of researching 16th-century Spain and decide to use time travel as a solution.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Prehistoric Romantic Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Time travel leads to a romantic encounter between Alley and Oola in prehistoric times.

sub_scenes.title: Accidental Time Travel to Present and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Accidental time travel brings Alley and Oola to the present day, where they are immediately tasked with a Spain assignment.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Buster and the Bullfight Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Buster's disruptive serenade, his attack on a famous matador, and his unexpected participation in a bullfight as a 'novelty act'.

sub_scenes.title: Buster's Serenade and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Oola are back in ancient Spain, while Buster's loud serenade causes disturbance and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment
The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony

sub_scenes.title: Buster Attacks Matador and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Buster attacks the matador, leading to his girlfriend's fury and the revelation of the matador's fame.

narrative_arcs.title: The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Don Jose's incapacitation leads to Buster becoming a 'novelty' bullfighter, with mixed audience reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Jealousy and Accusations in the Lab
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc returns to the modern setting, focusing on romantic jealousy and accusations directed at the time-traveling scientist.

sub_scenes.title: Waiting for Oop and Flirtation
sub_scenes.description: A woman impatiently waits for 'oop' to return, while another scene shows flirtatious exchange.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Jealous Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns to find a tied-up man and faces accusations of infidelity.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and the Clam Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the ironic concept of 'King for a Day', focusing on a clam dispute and the wise man's unusual resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to King for a Day and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' theme is introduced, followed by a confrontation on the throne.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship
New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification
New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

sub_scenes.title: Rum-Pus Cheating and Clam Dispute
sub_scenes.description: A clam dispute arises from a game of Rum-Pus, leading to a physical fight and the Wise Man's intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation
Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Recurring Fights, Royal Dinner, and Ulcer Issues
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features recurring fights outside the palace, a financial accusation, and a dinner scene highlighting the king's ulcer and dietary restrictions.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fight and Money Accusation
sub_scenes.description: A recurring fight breaks out, and the crowned man confronts a servant about money.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: Dinner is announced, but the crowned man is warned about his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: Peek-a-Boo Prank Turns Violent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc takes an unexpected turn from a playful prank to sudden violence.

sub_scenes.title: Peek-a-Boo Prank and Assault
sub_scenes.description: A playful peek-a-boo prank abruptly turns violent when the prankster punches the crowned man.

Major_Arcs.title: Various Apologies and Ruler Proposition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features scenes of apologies, relief at returning to normalcy, and a ruler proposition, along with a strange scene involving measurements and a 'strange duck'.

sub_scenes.title: Oompa and Pal's Apologies
sub_scenes.description: Oompa and Pal offer apologies in separate scenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and the Barberous Act of Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sets up a fortune telling prophecy that leads to a 'barberous act' of forced shaving, humorously subverting romantic expectations.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling Prophecy
sub_scenes.description: A woman visits a fortune teller and is told she will meet a handsome, bearded stranger.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the comic with a scientist's time machine experiment going awry, bringing a Roman soldier to the present instead of a caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Roman Soldier Materialization
sub_scenes.description: A scientist sets up his time machine to bring someone from the past, but a Roman soldier unexpectedly materializes.
